JobTitle: Director and Associate General Counsel, Cybersecurity Law & Investigations
JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a highly motivated attorney to lead its global, cybersecurity legal team and advise the company on a range of integrity, physical security, information security, and compliance initiatives for Facebook, Facebook Reality Labs, Facebook Financial, Instagram, and WhatsApp. The role will support Facebook’s security and integrity teams while working with business, engineering, operations, policy, and product teams, as well as other teams within legal. The position will be responsible for protecting our users and their data by counseling our product, business, integrity, and physical and information security teams, and by building and maintaining relationships with private and public sector entities focused on internet safety and security. The position will provide counsel and guidance to Facebook's security and integrity teams during investigations, incident response, information sharing and threat mitigation, and work directly with business and engineering teams to design and implement innovative privacy, integrity and security solutions.
